description: Says "Not Authorized" when asking for PIN and nothing happens.
Very easy to use, has a lot of potential to grow. Give it a try.
summary: Great Twitter client in the making!

description: I really hope the developer sticks with this app and really fleshes it out as a top tier app on Linux. We've never really had a great native Twitter app.
summary: Very solid fork of Twitter app

description: I would give it a 5 star if app notification can go to taskbar just the way slack does.
summary: Great but need a very necessary feature

description: I need a multi support client for mastodon and twitter.
summary: Would love to see mastodon support to

description: If the devs add the ability to minimize to the taskbar, this would be the twitter app to install
summary: Nice client worthy of an install

description:
lovelly app, its nice to see social media apps coming to ubuntu linux.
would recommend.
it doesn't work!
it sometimes glitches out but is otherwise functional. user interface is acceptable.
Good app feature-wise but for some reason has been hanging a lot and often requires force close. Another issue is that posting new tweets seem to fail with "Socket I/O timed out"
Thank you for creating it

It keeps freezing on me and ahven't been able to send out a tweet. I can't really blame my 2015 computer as it runs other apps such as Shotcut and GIMP just fine. I also don't find it super intuitive (yet?)

Yes you can have it all, be dancin' all your life, fantastic app. The video is seemless and to like a post you actually have to click on it. There goes those boring people that just like things without actually reading them. Good on ya Cawbird, best app so far on Linux.
everything except sending messages works on Manjaro Phosh Pinephone
I like the app, although more work can be done on functionality.

As soon as I open the link inside the application, the following message is displayed.

gstbaseparse.c(1370): gst_base_parse_sink_event_default (): /GstPlayBin:video/GstURIDecodeBin:uridecodebin1/GstDecodeBin:decodebin1/GstMpegvParse:mpegvparse1

Get error when trying to play video

gstvideodecoder.c(1138): gst_video_decoder_sink_event_default (): /GstPlayBin:video/GstURIDecodeBin:uridecodebin2/GstDecodeBin:decodebin2/avdec_mpeg4:avdec_mpeg4-5:
no valid frames found

With playing a video it says: gstdecodebin2.c(4694): gst_decode_bin_expose (): /GstPlayBin:video/GstURIDecodeBin:uridecodebin1/GstDecodeBin:decodebin1:
all streams without buffers
summary: Looks good, but video doesn't play

description: no funciona los videos y las imágenes a veces no me carga. Por el lado del uso para hacer retuit debo seleccionar con boton derecho para poder dar click al icono de retuit. En general es satisfactorio el uso.
summary: funciones básicas para lectura de twiter

description: It would be great if the apps are updated more often.
summary: Videos fail to play, because of a known issue, already fixed

description:
I downloaded Cawbird, started the app, got a message to get a PIN from Twitter, and a nice window pops up "Unauthorized".
I see that the issue has been known for a while, but also that it was somewhat archived.

I have used this application in the past, so I know it's very good. However it doesn't get the authorizing PIN from Twitter anymore, therefore I cannot set my account again.
Without the authorizing PIN Cawbird is useless.
It asked me for a PIN, and showed a url where I can get one. OK, but the url is a twitter page that does not exist. I looked where I can get a PIN, but I could not find how.

I installed the app from the Ubuntu Software store. It opens and shows a button to request a pin. After pressing button, the following error message appears:

GDBus.Error:org.freedesktop.portal.Error.NotAllowed: This call is not available inside the sandbox

I'm running Ubuntu 22.04.2 LTS. OS software is up-to-date.
unsuported software
Perhaps it is a feature not a bug, but the app asks for a PIN and authorization every time you open it. Then it just doesn't load.
The "thread" view with replies is a bit inconsistent and seems to miss some replies. However after reading the bug reports it seems to be a limitation in the official API.

Sending messages now works, the only thing i'd like that would make this just as good to me as my iPhones Twitter app, is changing the 'Mentions' catagory to just a 'Notifications' catagory, giving a '1' or '10' or whatever on it for each mention and retweet, yes, like the iPhone app ^^".. and maybe a "Sent from" setting that could be customized, excellent work! have you considered making a Facebook client at any point..?
Keep up the good work!

Setup is easy, but the whole experience is clunky. There is often a considerable delay in pressing a button and the app responding (I have an i9 gaming PC; it's not the hardware). I don't like the fact that reply, like, repost etc are hidden behind the Tweet (right click on the post to reveal these but the post disappears. I do like that the timeline is chronological and that the reply tab is just that: only posts that mention you (you're not bombarded with likes, reposts etc).
summary: It's OK, it works, but it laggy, slow and not that intuitive

description: Along with all the other third party clients, it has been blocked. Not Cawbird's fault, it's Elon Musk's fault.
summary: It's dead now, twitter blocked it

description: Ich muss für jedes Öffnen eine neue PIN von Twitter anfordern, hilfe!

Corebird war meiner Meinung der beste und übersichtlichste Twitter-Client für Linux. Cawbird führt dies konsequent fort.
Einen Pin musste ich nur beim ersten anmelden anfordern.

es ist ein wirklich schönes kleines programm, was man auch gut nebenbei laufen lassen kann. nur leider lassen sich handyvideos von anderen usern immer noch nicht abspielen. statt dessen kommen kurz hintereinander mehrere fehlermeldungen. ich würde mich echt freuen, wenn das problem endlich mal behoben werden würde. darum gebe ich auch nur drei sterne.
Welche Stümper haben dieses Programm geschrieben? Wie soll ich ohne Anmeldung einen PIN bei Twitter anfordern?
Sehr angenehme einfache UI fürs tägliche Twitter-Browsen ohne Schnick-Schnack und mit linearer Timeline. Genial!
Me solicita un PIN de twitter (ahora X), aparece un mensaje que manifiesta que la aplicación no esta autorizada.
cumple bien su funcion
no se muestran muchas portadas de twitter, videos etc.. el texto bien, pero creo que con los años que tiene podria tener mas madurez, y mostrar bien portadas, imagenes videos... gracias.

MIra que tiene años este cliente, pues no consiguen que muestre bien las portadas, ni imagenes ni videos ni nada, menos el texto que si. Prefiero hacer una web app que instalar este cliente mas veces a ver si mejora.
La aplicación funciona muy bien, para ser un cliente no oficial. Cumple con lo que ofrece.
summary: Gran trabajo pese a las restricciones de Twitter

description:
Mais un peu trop simple justement.
Réduire dans le system tray en fermant serait bien pratique par exemple.
Merci.
Impossible à lancer
